metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9458 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: In the Android kernel in the video driver there is a use after free due to a race condition. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
